text: 5.4 Lo 24.14-15, Jer 22.13, Mal 3.5 Nɨbi nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Binɨb wog gɨñeb nɨbi okok, kɨli tap wog nɨbi okok pɨpagɨpal. Pɨpagɨpal ak pen, kɨlop takaw yepɨs agɨl, mani kɨlop ñɨtep ma gɨpɨm. Anɨgem, mani anɨb ak God nop suk agɨl agup, Nad bɨawl anɨb okok kɨlop pen gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨmɨn agup. Pen binɨb wog gɨñeb nɨbi anɨb okok kɨli suk agɨl agel, Bɨawl kɨles mɨdupsek dɨ mɨdep ak ne nɨgup.
